TEXTS.ITEM: U1&FUNCTIONALITY& ASAllow to activate (compile) a components. U1&RELATIONS& AS U1&EXAMPLE& AS U1&HINTS& AS U1&FURTHER_SOURCES_OF_INF& AS

ITEM.TEXT: DD object type in DE management system

LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* USE THIS SOURCE FILE FOR ANY TYPE DECLARATIONS (CLASS *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* IMPLEMENTATION OR PRIVATE METHOD'S SIGNATURE
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: ` *"* LOCAL CLASS IMPLEMENTATION FOR PUBLIC CLASS *"* use this source file for the implementation part of *"* LOCAL HELPER CLASSES
LOCAL.MACROS: ` *"* USE THIS SOURCE FILE FOR ANY MACRO DEFINITIONS YOU NEED *"* IN THE IMPLEMENTATION PART OF THE CLASS

ITEM.SOURCE: ` CALL FUNCTION 'INTERN_TRANSL_EUTYPE' "Sperrtyp EXPORTING eutype = table_type IMPORTING enqueue_type = table_enq_type.

` DATA d_name TYPE td_table_name. DATA d_tname TYPE ygpl_tables_size=>td_table_name. DATA t_log TYPE tt_check_log. DATA s_line LIKE LINE OF check_log. FIELD-SYMBOLS: <l> LIKE LINE OF t_log, <t> LIKE LINE OF component_list.
component_list = ygpl_tables_size=>filter_table( comp_list ). component_list = ygpl_tables_size=>filter_by_table_size( list = component_list size_filter = r_size_filter ). * Process list LOOP AT component_list ASSIGNING <t>. d_name = <t>-name. t_log = get_table_check_protocol( d_name ). DELETE t_log WHERE NOT ( ( ag = 'DT' AND msgnr = '510' ) " Index &-& completely contains the fields of index & ) . CHECK NOT t_log IS INITIAL. LOOP AT t_log ASSIGNING <l>. CLEAR s_line. d_tname = s_line-table_name = <t>-name. s_line-index_name = <l>-var2. s_line-subindex_name = <l>-var3. MESSAGE ID <l>-ag TYPE 'I' NUMBER <l>-msgnr WITH <l>-var1 <l>-var2 <l>-var3 <l>-var4 INTO s_line-message. s_line-size = ygpl_tables_size=>get_index_size( table_name = d_tname index_name = s_line-subindex_name ). s_line-percent = 100 * " Percent 100 * " 2 decimals s_line-size / ygpl_tables_size=>db_size. s_line-size = s_line-size / 1024. " Ko => Mo s_line-tadir_info = ygpl_tables_size=>get_index_information( table_name = d_tname index_name = s_line-subindex_name ). APPEND s_line TO check_log. ENDLOOP. ENDLOOP. SORT check_log BY table_name subindex_name index_name.

` DATA objname TYPE rsedd0-ddobjname. DATA protid TYPE sy-tabix. DATA actmode TYPE ddrefstruc-mode. DATA subrc TYPE sy-subrc. DATA s_memid TYPE tstrf01-filename.
objname = name. CALL FUNCTION 'INTERN_DD_CHECK_EXIST'"Existenz-/Objektklasseprüfung EXPORTING objname = objname objtype = table_type err_message = ' ' objstate = 'M' exists = 'X' EXCEPTIONS OTHERS = 01. CHECK sy-subrc = 0.
CALL FUNCTION 'DD_OBJ_PROT_OPEN' EXPORTING objectname = objname objecttype = table_enq_type level = 1 device = 'M' ddfunc = 'CHE' IMPORTING prid = protid EXCEPTIONS OTHERS = 01. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0.
PERFORM stdo_set_format IN PROGRAM radbtout USING protid 'S'. actmode = 9. "Prüfen CALL FUNCTION 'DD_TABL_ACT' EXPORTING device = 'M' path = ' ' protname = ' ' tabname = objname timer_on = ' ' prid = protid act_mode = actmode * AUTH_CHK = 'X' * EXCOMMIT = 'X' IMPORTING act_result = subrc * TABLES * ACT_RES_TAB = EXCEPTIONS actok_failure = 1 dbchange_failure = 2 lockact_failure = 3 ntab_gen_failure = 4 put_failure = 5 read_failure = 6 unlockact_failure = 7 access_failure = 8 OTHERS = 9. CHECK sy-subrc = 0. " Generation Failure CHECK subrc <= 4. " Warning
CONCATENATE 'CHE' table_enq_type objname INTO s_memid. CALL FUNCTION 'TRINT_READ_LOG_FROM_MEMORY' EXPORTING iv_logname_memory = s_memid iv_free_memory = 'X' TABLES et_log = result EXCEPTIONS log_not_found = 1 OTHERS = 2. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0.

TYPES.ITEM: tt_check_log TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF trlogm WITH DEFAULT KEY `
tt_tables_check_log TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ygpl_tables_check_result WITH DEFAULT KEY `
